thread.title: Edward
thread.title_full: The Guy Who Fixes Computers reviewed by Edward

author: Edward
title: Edward
text: I had a good experience with Calvin, who was flexible enough to accommodate my tight scheduling, limited time and spousal computer withdrawal symptom pressure - I travel 6 hours to get to him while doing other business in the city. He's centrally located and a municipal parking lot is not far away. All went well - it was a laptop keyboard replacement, complicated by several different configurations and he accepted that the first choice (without being able to open the machine) was wrong and found an alternative.
